isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - IC BUS SERVICE MANUAL - OPERATION - DOOR CONTROLS

svcsubproc.title: Manual Door Control
svcsubproc.para: The manual door control is located on the front dash immediately to the right of the driver's seated position. The door control contains the door switch that activates a ground circuit that changes amber flasher lights to red flasher lights.
The door switch is located in the door control mechanism in the dash ( Figure 15).

svcsubproc.title: Air Actuated Door Control
svcsubproc.para: The air door control switch ( Figure 16) is a rotary switch located on the driver's console (optional). Some states require the door switch to be located to the right of the steering wheel. Various state regulations may apply.

figure.caption: Figure 16. Air Actuated Door Control Location

svcsubproc.title: Air Door Dump Valve
svcsubproc.para: The air door dump valve is located to the driver's right (seated position) attached to the dash ( Figure 17). The air will empty out of the air cylinder when the ignition is turned "OFF" or when the dump valve is switched to "MANUAL". The dump valve switch is a toggle switch. Various state regulations may apply.

figure.caption: Figure 17. Air Dump Valve Switch Location
